name: tinytask-cli
description: Command-line client for TinyTask MCP server

scripts.sea:macos: npm run bundle && node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && cp $(command -v node) dist/tinytask-macos && npx postject dist/tinytask-macos NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 --macho-segment-name NODE_SEA && codesign --sign - --force dist/tinytask-macos
scripts.sea:linux: npm run bundle && node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && cp $(command -v node) dist/tinytask-linux && npx postject dist/tinytask-linux NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
scripts.sea:windows: npm run bundle && node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync(process.execPath, 'dist/tinytask.exe')" && npx postject dist/tinytask.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
